attributes.action: Parliament should make it clear by how much Brexit will impoverish the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.xe.com/currencycharts/?from=GBP&to=EUR&view=2Y

http://www.xe.com/currencycharts/?from=GBP&to=USD&view=2Y

roughly equating the drop in purchasing power for the UK GDP denominated in GBP w.r.t to the major currencies

This calculation is of course very crude.

This last point is of course entirely irrelevant for such gigantic moves in the FX rates for GBP
attributes.background:
It can be estimated that changes in FX rates for GBP have resulted in a loss of 300-400 £Bn of purchasing power for the  UK GDP.
Prices are going up for staples.
It is owed to the populationthat they should be well informed as to what the probable and possible fiscal outcomes are for Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you would like the Government to publish its analysis of the impact of Brexit on certain sectors of the economy, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200634
